nodes.bodyText: Would it be difficult to switch this over to using the EventChannel interface to get this event rather than the EventBus while you're here?  Don't worry if it takes more than a couple of minutes but it would be nice to get rid of one more usage of EventBus.
Started looking into this, but I wanted to make a generic ChainUpdates channel to consolidate various chain events and decided it was too much to put into this PR.
anchorState is the more correct term (and possibly we should update a lot of places that refer to Genesis).  We might be starting from a state that isn't slot 0.

When we process the genesis state, we construct an empty block from the state and apply an empty signature - which I don't think we want to do for non-genesis anchors.  But, I went ahead and changed GenesisEvent to AnchorPoint so that we have a more generic object to work with, and changed this builder to just work with AnchorPoint's.
